name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- [GameObjectBrush] Set HideFlags of instantiated GameObject to HideFlags.None when painting
- [GridInformation] Fix serialization of GridInformationKey/Value

4.0.1.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
4.0.1.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- [AnimatedTileEditor] -Add field to change TileAnimationFlags (For 2022.2.x)
- [RuleTile] -Add RotatedMirror rule which checks neighbors using both the mirror and rotation Rule in addition to the standard rotation Rule

### Fixed
- [GameObjectBrush] Fix placement of GameObjects for Hexagon Layouts with Anchor
- [GameObjectBrush] Align rotation and flip to 2D View in Editor
- [RandomBrush] Use default color and transform when painting over with RandomBrush

### Changed
- [AnimatedTileEditor] Moved to Unity.2d.Tilemap.Extras.Editor

3.1.0.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
3.1.0.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
- [RuleTile] Add RotatedMirror rule which checks neighbors using both the mirror and rotation Rule in addition to the standard rotation Rule

### Fixed
- [GameObjectBrush] Validate size of GameObjectBrush when it changes

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- [TintBrush] Replace obsolete method calls.

- [GameObjectBrush] Fix placement of GameObjects for Hexagon Layouts with Anchor

- [RandomBrush] Use default color and transform when painting over with RandomBrush

4.0.0-pre.1.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
4.0.0-pre.1.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

_upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- [RuleOverrideTile] -Mark RuleOverrideTile InstanceTile as dirty when overriding RuleTile for the RuleOverrideTile changes
- [RuleOverrideTile] -Fix undo for RuleOverrideTile when overriding RuleTile has changed
- [RuleTileEditor] -Fix height for ReorderableList when extending the view for marking Rules

3.0.2.name: com.unity.2d.tilemap.extras
3.0.2.description:
2D Tilemap Extras is a package that contains extra scripts for use with 2D Tilemap features in Unity. These include custom Tiles and Brushes for the Tilemap feature.

The following are included in the package:
Brushes: GameObject Brush, Group Brush, Line Brush, Random Brush
Tiles: Animated Tile, Rule Tile, Rule Override Tile
Other: Grid Information, Custom Rules for Rule Tile

samples.description: An example implementation of an Animated Tile.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching four-way orthogonal neighbors.
An example implementation of a Rule Tile with rules matching eight-way orthogonal and diagonal neighbors.

upm.changelog:
### Fixed
- [AnimatedTileEditor] -Fix undo when setting number of Sprites for Animated Tile
- [RuleTile] -Fix data for custom container fields not being transferred in RuleOverrideTiles overriding a Custom Rule Tile
- [RuleTileEditor] -Fix undo when setting number of Rules for Rule Tile
- [RuleTileEditor] -Use different text color for Extend Neighbors with dark and light skin
